title: [GAMEPLAY] Yasuo - Unable to move or attack after E or Ult (very frequently)
body:
I have played Yasuo more than 3000 games since he's been released, and I noticed that he has a very critical bug.
It doesn't happen all the time, but it happens very frequently enough to make a huge influence on my games.

1. Use E or on a minion or a creep, or enemy champion

2. Try to attack with right click, or Player Attack Move click, or just let Yasuo Auto Attack himself. (after checking Auto Attack box in option menu)

*This happens after his Ult too.


I have missed so many kill chances because of this... and in team fights, it has been very frustrating because I couldn't move nor AA to finish off enemies, thus failed to do my job properly as a damage dealer. 
First, I thought I was misclicking or I was CC'd by enemies but I have tested over so many games and I am sure that I wasn't.


Reasons that I think this is a 100% bug are:

1. I have checked [Auto Attack} box in option menu ( which means, after using E or Ult on enemy, Yasuo should AA without clicking enemy manually.)

2. I have tested in bot games and enemy bot champions didn't have any CC.( I could relax and check carefully without worrying about getting CC'd.) 


Please fix this Riot, I will get DJ Sona so please do fix it. Please.
